### 介绍
作者：李明玥

### 代码
```{r}
numflowers <- function(x) {
  # numflowers: 为玫瑰花的个数赋予意义
  
  switch(toString(x),
  # tostring: 将输入的x变为字符串
          "1"=" only you ",
          "2"=" just us ",
          "7"=" love quietly",
          "9"=" always ",
          "1314"=" love you forever ",
          "10"=" perfect love",
          " I love you ")
  # 分别对1,2,7,9,1314,10赋值，输入其余的均输出”I love you”
} 
```

### 演示
```{r}
numflowers(1)
numflowers(1314)
numflowers(99)
```
